abstract: Letter from Rep Janice Hahn comments on Jan 18 Op-Ed article by Sam Quinones about changing attitudes among Mexican immigrants toward civic government.
lead_paragraph: Representative Janice Hahn, a California Democrat, and the Latino Victory Project discuss comprehensive immigration reform.
snippet: Representative Janice Hahn, a California Democrat, and the Latino Victory Project discuss comprehensive immigration reform.

headline.main: Getting Immigrants ‘Right With the Law’ Benefits All
headline.print_headline: Getting Immigrants ‘Right With the Law’ Benefits All
